pages.text: Before making bronze, we will need to create a Forge Hammer. It can hammer or saw items.$(br2)You can put iron, copper and tin ore in the forge hammer and you will receive 2 Crushed Dust per ore. Every crushed dust can be smelted into an ingot.
Now, you may want to consider making a Steam Mining Drill... Check the next page!
The Steam Mining Drill can mine 3x3 blocks at the time, perfect for your early game mining needs!

The Steam Mining Drill requires both water and solid fuel (for example coal).$(br2)Right-click a water source to fill it with water, and make sure to always place some fuel next in your drill by right-clicking the fuel items on it in your inventory. The fuel will be consumed slowly when you mine.
